product_name: Bermudagrass Patch Kit for Common Bermudagrass Lawns
description:
Get your bermudagrass lawn back on track

This dual-action kit fixes bare spots while greening your entire lawn.

Ever look at those patchy spots in your bermudagrass and wish you had a complete solution? This kit has you covered with Bare Repair to fill in up to 65 sq. ft. of bare areas with premium common bermudagrass seed, plus Lawn Vitality (15-0-0) to feed and green up to 3,000 sq. ft. of your existing lawn. The combination creates a lawn that looks seamless from edge to edge. Just remember it's designed for common bermudagrass, not hybrid varieties.

At Sunday, we create lawn solutions that work with nature—so you can enjoy your yard and spend less time maintaining it.

sections.whats_included: Premium Common Bermudagrass seed, slow-release fertilizer, and liquid nitrogen fertilizer in an easy-to-use kit. Includes 2 jugs of Bare Repair (covers 65 sq. ft.), 1 bottle of Lawn Vitality 15-0-0 fertilizer (covers 3,000 sq. ft.), and a Sunday hose-end sprayer.
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply when temperatures are consistently warm (70-90°F).
Apply Lawn Vitality fertilizer using the included sprayer and allow to dry completely
Prepare patchy areas by removing debris and loosening soil surface
Apply Bare Repair at recommended rates: 1 cup per 1 sq. ft. for bare spots
Water seeded areas 1-2 times daily until grass reaches 2" height
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
When is the best time to apply this kit?
For the best results, apply Lawn Vitality liquid fertilizer in temperatures between 50 and 85 degrees F, typically in the early morning or evening.
Seed Bare Repair Bermudagrass when daily temperatures consistently hold between 70-90 degrees F, usually in the spring and summer.
Can I use this kit alongside other Sunday lawn products?
Yes, the Bermudagrass Patch Kit can be effectively used with other Sunday lawn care products. Lawn Vitality can be used in combination with your Custom Lawn Plan or other nutrients, just allow 4-6 weeks between nutrient applications. If using weed control, apply before seeding for best results.
When is it safe for people and pets to go on the lawn after applying the kit?
It's safe to return to the lawn after the liquid fertilizer and seeded areas have dried. However, for optimal results, especially for seed germination, limiting traffic on the newly seeded areas is recommended until the grass is established.
When will I see results?
Bermudagrass seeds germinate (or grow) in 21 days, but may take more or less time pending conditions. Typically, fertilizers offer 4-6 weeks of growth and results are visible within hours to days.
Bare Repair Instructions
Our cutting-edge formula has all the bare essentials (and then some) to thicken up thin spots, stimulate growth, and get green grass where nothing else has worked. This unique blend contains premium grass seed, slow-release nitrogen to feed new growth, and recycled paper mulch to hold in much-needed moisture. Ready to get growing?
